name: ner-annotation-ui
description: NER Annotation UI with PDF support

scripts.start:backend: npm --prefix backend run build && npm --prefix backend start
scripts.start:frontend: npm --prefix frontend run build && npm --prefix frontend run preview
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm --prefix backend install && npm --prefix frontend install
scripts.build: npm --prefix backend run build && npm --prefix frontend run build

author: YS
